content: शाला [शाल्-अच्] {@--1@} An apartment, a room, saloon, hall; गृहैर्विशालैरपि भूरिशालैः <ls>Śi. 3. 50</ls>; so संगीतशाला, रंगशाला &c. {@--2@} A house, an abode; <ls>R. 16. 41.</ls> {@--3@} The upper or main branch of a tree. {@--4@} The trunk of a tree. {@--5@} A stable, stall; as in वाजिशाला, गर्दभशाला &c.
